newsitem.title: USA: ACE completes Ockham unit purchase, buys Methuen.
newsitem.headline: ACE completes Ockham unit purchase, buys Methuen.

text.p: ACE Ltd of Hamilton, Bermuda, said it completed its acquisition of Ockham Worldwide Holdings Plc and bought the remaining 49 percent interest in Methuen Group Ltd for an undisclosed amount.
ACE announced on November 7 it agreed to buy Ockham Worldwide for 19.5 million sterling in cash and notes.

As a result of the completed acquisition, Ockham Worldwide's aviation agency changed its name to ACE London Aviation Ltd and its non-marine agency changed its name to ACE London Underwriting Ltd, ACE said.
ACE bought the remaining interest in Methuen Group to have full ownership of all its Lloyd's managing agency interests, it said.
The ACE group of companies insurance interests at Lloyd's now comprise the Worldwide managing agencies and the Methuen managing agency, Ace said.
ACE's 1997 projected underwriting capacity for the agencies totals 746 million sterling, it added.
